page.title: 12ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: We have lots of discos in the community centre. We have a tuckshop we can buy mars,twix,crisps and record ghostbuster and the conger and so on and we do break-dancing and like caterpiller and we have a great time. We start at 7.00 to 11.00.We have great fun. Me and my friend Matthew have great fun.We run after each other when he caught I run after him.It is great fun and we run around the building we dance sometimes to the end. It is great at the disco. When the disco lights are off we go home and we play monsters on the way.
